SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local n = MTG():GetActionRepCount() local num_players = MTG():GetNumberOfPlayers() local playerindex = n local player = MTG():GetNthPlayer(playerindex) local filter = Object():GetFilter()
if player ~= nil and n < num_players then
-- ask the query filter:Clear() filter:SetPlayer( player ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_HAND ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, player ) filter:May() player:ChooseTarget( NO_VALIDATION, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_TO_PUT_ONTO_BATTLEFIELD", EffectDC():Make_Targets(n) ) return true
else local i=0 for i=0,(num_players-1) do local targetDC = EffectDC():Get_Targets(i)
if targetDC ~= nil then local target_card = targetDC:Get_CardPtr(0) if target_card ~= nil then if target_card:GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) ~= 0 and target_card:GetSubType():Test( ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_AURA ) ~= 0 then target_card:GetPlayer():PseudoPlaySpell(target_card) else target_card:PutIntoPlay( target_card:GetPlayer() ) end end end end return false end
